text: læa yang prachachati mad yan nan rea di sng chu xaybˌ sung pen phinxng khxng phwk khea pi khea klaw wa xo prachachati khxng chan cng khearph sakkara xallxhˌ theid mimi sing dı thi khwr di rab kar khearph sakkara sahrab phwk than xik læw xun cak phraxngkh thæcring hlakthan xan chadcen cak phracea khxng phwk than nan di mayang phwk than læw dangnan cng hı khrb tem sung kheruxng twng læa kheruxng chang theid læa cng xya hı khad kæ pheuxn mnusʹy sung brrda singkhxng khxng phwk khea læa cng xya kx khwam seiyhay nı phændin hlangcak thi mi kar kækhi man læw nanhæla pen sing thi di ying kæ phwk than hak phwk than pen phu sraththa
